abstract: Chevron has agreed to acquire Atlas Energy for $4.3 billion, the most recent deal by an energy company to expand in the natural gas sector.
snippet: Chevron has agreed to acquire Atlas Energy for $4.3 billion, the most recent deal by an energy company to expand in the natural gas sector.
lead_paragraph: 8:41 a.m. | Updated Chevron announced on Tuesday that it would acquire Atlas Energy for $4.3 billion, including the assumption of debt, in the most recent deal by an energy company to expand in the natural gas sector.

headline.main: Chevron to Buy Atlas Energy for $4.3 Billion
